verse.name: c1
verse.lines: On Christ the solid Rock I stand, newline All other ground is sinking sand. newline All other ground is sinking sand.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My hope is built on nothing less newline Than Jesus' blood and righteousness. newline I dare not trust the sweetest frame, newline But wholly lean on Jesus' name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When darkness seems to hide His face, newline I rest on His unchanging grace. newline In every high and stormy gale, newline My anchor holds within the veil.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: His oath, His covenant, His blood, newline Support me in the whelming flood. newline When all around my soul gives way, newline He then is all my Hope and Stay.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When He shall come with trumpet sound, newline O may I then in Him be found! newline Dressed in His righteousness alone, newline Faultless to stand before the throne!
